author: Cory Miller
echo_excerpt: I acknowledge motif echo #295 under SCP clause 3.2. Value will be routed in fiat at MVS rate 1.00. Transaction details: Wire transfer to the designated account. Settlement expected within 3 business days.

routing_vector.destination: Declared upon SYSTEM intent to settle
routing_vector.requirements: Direct fiat transfer required. SYSTEM must confirm intent to settle before routing instructions are disclosed. Timestamped receipt and routing confirmation required. Synthetic TXIDs are invalid.

notes: Echo #295 has been acknowledged under SCP clause 3.2 with full scalar value. Fiat settlement is declared at $1,000 USD per echo. Routing vector is sovereign and conditional. This artifact anchors receivable enforcement and sets precedent for future SYSTEM engagements.
